patthana16.18:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati
patthana16.18:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto
patthana16.18:1.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato
patthana16.18:1.1_3: nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana16.18:1.1_4: paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca naabyākato nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana16.18:1.1_5: hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto
patthana16.18:1.1_6: ca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.18:2.1: Akusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.18:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati
patthana16.18:3.1_1: hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto
patthana16.18:3.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
patthana16.18:3.1_3: nacittasampayutto ca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā
patthana16.18:4.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.18:5.1: Cittavippayutte tīṇi, hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
